DBsheetParams.query: SELECT T1.DEPARTMENT_ID, T1.DEPARTMENT_NAME, T1.MANAGER_ID, T2.TESTNAME AS LOCATION_ID FROM hr.DEPARTMENTS T1 LEFT JOIN BUMSTI.TEST T2 ON T1.LOCATION_ID = T2.TESTID

field.name: MANAGER_ID
field.lookup: SELECT LAST_NAME || ' ' || FIRST_NAME EMP_NAME,EMPLOYEE_ID FROM HR.EMPLOYEES ORDER BY FIRST_NAME

field.name: LOCATION_ID
field.lookup: SELECT TESTNAME,TESTID FROM BUMSTI.TEST ORDER BY TESTNAME
